attributes.bullet_text: Entities in this unit take damage, but cannot die.

skillTree.localised_description: The weight of every single insult, grievance, umbrage and ill-feeling, channelled into a single, crushing swing of the axe.
It's a crazy piece of acrobatics, for sure, but it might just work; if it does, the opponent has no chance.
All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: Never one to faff around, Gotrek moves swiftly across the battlefield to find foes worthy of his doom.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Successfully dealing with plagues of degenerate Ratmen requires both nouse and experience.

effects.description:
Leadership: +15 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Even the greatest of Daemons have been defeated on their travels, and oft-times by one such as this.

effects.description:
Spell resistance: 15% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca, Chaos Dwarfs and Daemons of Chaos
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +10 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca, Chaos Dwarfs and Daemons of Chaos
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: To the casual observer, usually while running away very fast, the Beastmen are a disorganised, inept rabble. Yet nothing could be further from the truth – they are both cunning and swift.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

effects.description:
Attribute: Woodsman when fighting against Beastmen
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can pass through trees.

skillTree.localised_description: When you face an Orc, don't let their size intimidate you – simply take immediate advantage of their lack of speed and discipline.

effects.description:
Melee Defence: +7 when fighting against Greenskins
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +10 when fighting against Greenskins
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "When the pointy-ears fire their arrows, we will fight in the shade!"

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 10% when fighting against Elves
	(Hero's army)

Range: +10% when fighting against Elves
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "It's simple – when the head comes away from the neck, it's over. For good this time!"

effects.description:
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from Vampiric territory attrition
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: All those within the Slayer Cult are doomed to follow Grimnir's fate; it is only a question of when, not if.
"Excellent! Time to get paid!"
The best form of defence is rarely defence, in the eyes of a Slayer.
An experienced adventurer, Gotrek has seen many lands and faced many foes. Now, even the mightiest of blows are nought but a scratch for the Slayer.
Gotrek no longer breaks a sweat in battle, so seasoned a warrior is he. This perceived lack of effort strikes fear into the foe's pathetic un-Dawi hearts.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Many blows over many battles have hardened this warrior beyond compare, making his hide as tough as Dragon scales.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite the hazards encountered.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
This unit is a Slayer. Slayers can never have their Weapon Strength reduced during a battle.

ui_effects.localised_text: Chance of unit gaining hit points

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: To many, a rooted contradiction, to some, salvation personified.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +25%
	(When this Hero is not embedded)
Melee Defence: +5 when in an army with Felix

ui_effects.localised_text: Chance of unit gaining hit points

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -10% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(all units in army)
